### Abstract: Disaster Centric Real Estate Valuation (D-CREV) {#Disaster-Properties}

The devastation caused from recent hurricanes to metropoletan areas and a lack of coverage on homes by National Flood Insurance creates an unusual possible real estate arbitrage opporunity. Uninsured flooded homes unable to renovate, sell marketly below prior estimated list prices due to damage from the storm. This study aims to examine public and private data sources to determine the validity of homes impacted by flooding from Hurricanes and if findings show they recover their value and what the characteristics are of such these investments.
